extendedInfo.description: Visually stunning real-time virtual Earth. Fed by satellite imagery to display day/night, clouds, seasons, sun, moon and more. Day/night clock (with widget) tracks phases of the moon, sunrise, sunset and transit times. "Superbly stylish, incredibly detailed and unbeatably useful" - LifeOfAndroid.com"TerraTime is unique.  It is bold and different .." - AndroidApps Review "Possibly the most beautiful phone app Iâve seen. Highly recommended." - AndroidAstronomer.com"The overall beauty of the app is well, its beauty!" - CoolSmartPhone.com"Totally engaging" - James"Astonishingly detailed" - Mark"Amazingly accurate" - LarryGreat for travellers, those dealing with other time zones, astronomers, weather watchers, geographers, teachers, photographers, fishermen & other outdoor types - as well as just about any geek you can think of.  Features:â¢ Real-time simulations include clouds, city lights, sea ice, and more, generated from actual satellite imageryâ¢ Clock and compass also show sunrise & sunset; moon phase, moonrise & set; twilight & transit timesâ¢ Globe and map are fully interactive, using touchscreen or device sensorsâ¢ Easily shows any date, any locationâ¢ Clock and globe widgets â¢ Live wallpapers for real-time map and globeâ¢ Tablet compatiblePermissions explained:Full Internet access - to download the satellite imagery used to make the map and globe.View network state - to ensure that you have a high-speed data connection before downloads take place.Location - sunrise and sunset times depend on where you are; GPS is used when no network is available.Start at boot, set wallpaper - both essential to making the live wallpaper work.Write SD - for caching images locally.

reviews.title: Very precise
reviews.comment: This app is great for instant access to sunrise/sunset times, moon phase and moon location. Pretty cool 3D earth/moon/sun model, as well.
reviews.author: Phil Vaglia

reviews.title: Home Screen Now Synchronized
reviews.comment: Issue appears to be fixed.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: TerraTime
reviews.comment: Last time I gave it five stars. The look and feel of this new release deserve even more. A genuinely professional piece of programming. Cass at Rushworth Observatory.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Excellent
reviews.comment: Really enjoy the visual representation of the day on the hybrid 24 hour clock. Sun rise, set, and LOD are equally welcomed.
reviews.author: Wayne Randall

reviews.title: Excellent
reviews.comment: Superb app. The live globe wallpaper with real-time satellite cloud cover is stunning. Well worth the pro upgrade.
reviews.author: Gary Coombs

reviews.title: Wow great app!
reviews.comment: This is the best app, I love the live wallpaper,  it is worth your money! It is a awesome view for your phone.
reviews.author: Bill Ankney

reviews.title: First app I\'ve bought before trying
reviews.comment: Seems to be good, is there a \"flat view\" of the world, showing all timezones and where the sun is? That would make a great wallpaper...
reviews.author: Nicolas Blaza

reviews.title: Excellent
reviews.comment: A very good app, works perfectly and is instructional, fascinating and useful! Also, excellent customer service, which means so much these days.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Great app, but you should allow the clock to be used as a live wallpaper\tThe coolest part of this app is the 24hr clock that shows light/dark, sun rise/set, and moon rise/set times.  You should allows the clock to be used as live wallpaper as the clock widget is too small to be useful on a tablet.
reviews.author: Robert Sears

reviews.title: Love this app! Amazing
reviews.comment: Great App Beautiful addition to my tablet. Works like a dream. Would recommend (and have) recommend to anyone with an android device. Everyone who I have shown it to has been very impressed. Great job.
reviews.author: James Pickens

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: I love this app too much as it displays the day-night conditions of earth & also shows the present weather conditions of earth at my location in a high resolution mode. Great works devs
reviews.author: Praveen Kumar

reviews.title: OK, I Am Impressed!
reviews.comment: Wow!  Unreal!  Incredible view of our planet with real time satellite and positioning of the sun and moon, as well as a night-time view with city lights and darkness in the appropriate locations if you choose.  I have been using this live wallpaper for a week now and it blows me away.  I would recommend this to everyone and anyone!  It is incredible!  Everyone I show it to is mesmerized!  It is easily worth twice the price being charged!
reviews.author: Mark Edgerton

reviews.title: Drains Battery
reviews.comment: This is a cool application and I enjoy its features, but I will not use any extra little application that will suck so much of the valuable battery life on my phone. In a day this background application, without being actively used, takes 10% of my battery. This is just unacceptable. I wish that I had not paid for this. --Update. I took the advice of the developer and re-installed the program, which is now running with much less battery use. I have adjusted my score and would like to say thanks to the developer for being responsive.
reviews.author: Kristopher Hall

reviews.title: Amazing!
reviews.comment: Great app developer! I\'ve just run into an issue however. My globe widget now doesn\'t load and has not been for most of this morning. It gets to 33% and then says \"failed to load. ..try again\". I\'m sure this could be fixed easily. UPDATE: Developer responded quickly and fixed the issue. Highly recommend this app to anyone.
reviews.author: Phillip Hopkins

reviews.title: Well thought out
reviews.comment: I use free apps so this is an adventure for me. I was intrigued by this app 1yr ago but did not want to spend the money. After looking at the screenshots again today I decided to buy it. I am very impressed with the moon phase and rise and set times of both sin and moon. I will test it out and post another review. I\'m convinced this will continue to be 5 stars in my view. Now to see how it behaves and if it is accurate.
reviews.author: Jack Melanson

reviews.title: **I have a major bug to report**
reviews.comment: Very good app.  There is a fatal bug that I found while messing around with the latitude and longitude settings to see what place has the most daylight. I set it to 90\302\260 N and 0\302\260 W and the app instantly crashed and made my phone screen flicker and the phone reset on S4 from that point the app was broken and couldn\'t open so I had to delete and reinstall. You should fix this flaw before someone else does it again, thanks!
reviews.author: Sandy Leask

reviews.title: Night lights a bit inaccurate
reviews.comment: Just noticed that my location in Australia isn\'t correct at all with the night time lighting, no one lives in the middle, makes me wonder how much is real or just fake
reviews.author: Lee Evans

reviews.title: Nicely done time app
reviews.comment: Really slick UI and packed with information. Exceptional service received from developer when I raised an issue.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Amazing
reviews.comment: The app is amazing but only one problem, the live wallpapers don\'t work, and I would like an option to turn off the auto update but it\'s not necessary.
reviews.author: Jay S

reviews.comment: Beyond compare. Puts the world in your pocket, literally. Works great with Moon Phase pro, that puts the moon in your pocket too.
reviews.author: A Google User
